block.witherutils.angel.desc:
§9How to use:§r
 Can be placed in Air. Look up and Click!
block.witherutils.anvil.desc:
§9How to Become:§r 
 Place a Vanilla Anvil and right Click it with a SoulOrb. 

 §9How to use:§r 
 Place Ingredients with Right Click. Use the Hammer, to smash it.

item.witherutils.cutter.desc:
§9How to Use:§r 
Another Version of Chisel like Tool. 
Right Click to open Gui, and using 
the left Slot for Input Ingredients.
item.witherutils.shield_basic.desc:
§9How to Use:§r 
Right Click to Block.
item.witherutils.soulorb.desc:
■-§9 §nInformation:
§r§fThis Orb is filled with Souls, that the Wither Boss has trapped.§r
■-§9 §nHowtoBecome:
§r§fDimension listed below.§r
■-§9 §nHowtoUse:
§r§fYou can either use them for crafting, or Right-Click to enhance your PlayerSoulPower.§r
item.witherutils.wand.desc:
§9WandAttack:§r 
 §7Left-Click§r on Mobs WIP. 

 §9WandPort:§r 
 §7Right-Click§r Porting in direction you look at.
item.witherutils.worm.desc:
§9How to use:§r 
Right Click on Grass, Dirt or Farmland.
item.witherutils.wrench.desc:
§9How to Use:§r 
This is for rotating Blocks and give Xray for Camo Blocks.
